* Zyber nodded at Rowdy's offer to join him by the fire, she would also like the oppertunity to talk and learn more about each other. She slowly moved up beside him but then moved off to the side a bit as not to make contact, she then kneeled by the blazing fire and noted it's heat. She smiled at the warmness of it and then looked up at Rowdy, so he had no memory of how he had gotten here? That was about as much as she knew as well.*

" I have no recolection of how long I have been here either, all I recall is being in my youth as a child when I first ventured out into the wilds of this world. Quite a frighteneing experience for the longest time but soon I adapted and began to learn the trials of nature of it's ways, learning servival skills and migrating with my prey when their time came.
But I have always loved it."
